page.title: 11 HARNAGE GRANGE
page.content: The farm has three combine harvesters sharing the amount of arable farm worked. There are also 14-15 tractors. The farm extends over a large area of the grid and Mr. Scott also owns two farms in Ludlow and Leominster, the Scotts being a strong farming family. There are numerous farm buildings for storage etc. A gazebo is also near, giving views of the Wrekin. Owing to inadequate shopping facilities, all puchases have to be made outside the district. The house itself is a mixture of styles, having originally been two houses. It is mainly built of sandstone.
